A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not exaggerating: This is my favorite Star Wars movie. I loved it the first time\, and even moreso the second and third time I watched it in theaters. The comedy worked for me\, and the themes were very powerful. I think people didn't like that Johnson was trying to add more gray where there should only be white and black\, but I liked it. Not everything the \"heroes\" are heroic in real life\, and no \"good guys\" are every perfect. The story allows characters to actually make frustrating mistakes. Also\, it deserves a high rating just for the beautiful filming on Crait.
